entry.title: responsive image gallery theme, notes on how to use json files on a website

content.div:
i added the following changes to my site over the last two weeks:
published a new free to use image gallery template. it includes a filter/tab system and popups when clicking on an image, both of which work without javascript. comes with detailed instructions on how to use it as well as a link to the folder on my site's github where you can look at how i generated it from markdown files and an eleventy template
published tutorials for two methods of adding data to a webpage from a json file: using eleventy and javascript
added two new buttons for my site, one of which features fran from ffxii and the other nemissa from soul hackers
added a uses list to my about page
added three older projects and one recently finished cardigan to my crafts page
released a slight redesign of my resources site and updated the japanese page with more grammar resources i've been using lately and more youtubers i've been listening to (which is now split into ~N5/N4 and ~N3 categories)

entry.title: vegan page added, notes on how to prevent gif autoplay

content.div:
i added the following changes to my site this past week:
published a vegan page. currently has a toybox for farm animals, and links to my favorite recipes and cookbooks
added four new notes to the notebook section: preventing gif autoplay, batch printing images in a folder to html, my most used imagemagick commands, and how i use the details html tag. i also updated the css, so if something looks weird or broken please hard refresh
on my resources site, dead links were updated on the switch page and more links were added to the site building page, including the creation of a javascript libraries section
updated the button wall on my main page. please contact me if your site is missing or you'd like your button removed/changed!

long time no update... ^^; here's the changes i made to my site the last week or two:
published a crafts page for sharing my fiber arts projects
published a notebook section for random notes and tutorials that might be helpful to others. mostly related to language learning, site building, and linux
updated my language learning page with a few updates on how my routine has changed, plus i added a media log of things i've watched or read in my target languages
re-added a chattable box to the main page, plus added a new window for things i'm currently playing, reading, making, etc
two new places to my favorite video game locations
various bug fixes and optimizations
added a new page to share links to my favorite articles, blog posts, and other written content from around the web

redesigned my about page to be more soul hackers themed. i also removed the chatbox on my main page since the service i was using, chattable, is no longer active :( once i've decided on a new service it'll be replaced tho!

entry.title: more stuff added to the resources site

content.div: i added more links to my resources site. specifically i added some more online tools and references to the website building page, added goldendict to the language learning tools page, and added a browser tools and extensions section to the more links page.

finally released my website building page on my resources site to the public! i still want to add sections for graphics and accessibility in the future though. i did some behind-the-scenes updates to the code on my resources site last week to make it functional without javascript, so if something looks broken please hard refresh (ctrl+f5)

entry.title: my favorite video game locations
entry.content: added a new page for my favorite video game locations! it works better if audio autoplay is enabled but you can manually toggle audio on and off too.
